dom_etf_name: return document.querySelector("#__layout > div > div > div.cm-content.container > main > div > div.fundholding__head > div > div > article > div.stockMainInfo__summaryHeader > div.stockMainInfo__title > h1").innerHTML
dom_date: return document.querySelector("#__layout > div > div > div.cm-content.container > main > div > div:nth-child(4) > section > div.fundholding__date").innerHTML
dom_tb: return document.querySelector("#__layout > div > div > div.cm-content.container > main > div > div:nth-child(4) > section > div:nth-child(2) > div > table > tbody").innerHTML
